plot: Gail Nernon, arriving late for a rehearsal, loses her job in the cast of a big Broadway show. Craig Stafford offers to set her up with an apartment, money and clothes but she turns him down...
title: Dame Chance
plot_es: Gail Nernon, arriving late for a rehearsal, loses her job in the cast of a big Broadway show. Craig Stafford offers to set her up with an apartment, money and clothes but she turns him down...
plot_en: Gail Nernon, arriving late for a rehearsal, loses her job in the cast of a big Broadway show. Craig Stafford offers to set her up with an apartment, money and clothes but she turns him down...
